ctx: intros a b c H1 H2.
intros a b c H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: unfold rel_prime in H1, H2, H3, H4.

ctx: intros a b c H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: unfold is_gcd in H1, H2, H3, H4.

ctx: intros a b c H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment a, b, c : nat H1 : is_gcd 1 a b H2 : is_gcd 1 a c Unable to unify "exists q : nat, ?M1404 = 1 * q" with "divides a 1 /\\ divides (b * c) 1".

ctx: intros a b c H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros a b c H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment a, b, c : nat H1 : is_gcd 1 a b H2 : is_gcd 1 a c d : nat Hd : is_cd d a (b * c) Unable to unify "is_cd 1 (quo b d (gcd_div_l d b c ?M1405)) (quo c d (gcd_div_r d b c ?M1405)) /\\ (forall d' : nat, is_cd d' (quo b d (gcd_div_l d b c ?M1405)) (quo c d (gcd_div_r d b c ?M1405)) -> divides 1 d')" with "exists q : nat, 1 = d * q".

ctx: intros a b c H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment a, b, c : nat H1 : is_gcd 1 a b H2 : is_gcd 1 a c d : nat Hd : is_cd d a (b * c) Unable to unify "is_cd d a (b * c)" with "divides 1 d".

original: intros a b c H1 H2. unfold rel_prime in H1, H2. unfold rel_prime. intros H3 H4. unfold rel_prime in H1, H2, H3, H4. unfold is_gcd in H1, H2, H3, H4. split. - apply gauss with (d:=1). + apply H3. + apply H1. - intros d Hd. apply gcd_rel_prime with (d:=d) (a:=b) (b:=c). + apply Hd. + apply H4.
